metadata.title: CVE-2024-35992 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: phy:marvell: a3700-comphy: Fix out of bounds read There is an out of boundsread access of 'gbe_phy_init_fix[fix_idx].addr' every iteration after'fix_idx' reaches 'ARRAY_SIZE(gbe_phy_init_fix)'. Make sure'gbe_phy_init[addr]' is used when all elements of 'gbe_phy_init_fix' arrayare handled. Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) withSVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
